subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A victory over the 10th-ranked Huskies adds another bullet point to the growing résumé of the Red Storm, which is looking for its first N.C.A.A. tournament berth since 2002.
snippet: A victory over the 10th-ranked Huskies adds another bullet point to the growing résumé of the Red Storm, which is looking for its first N.C.A.A. tournament berth since 2002.
